Package io.tessilab.oss.hypop.execution.stopCondition

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CompositeStopCondition
    pplies the composite design pattern ( https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Composite_pattern ) to allow to have many StopCondition in the execution.
    CompositeStopCondition.Config  
    JobsToDoStopCondition
    A stop condition based on the number of jobs to do.
    JobsToDoStopCondition.Config  
    MaxScoreStopCondition<T extends Comparable>
    A stop condition that occurs when a target score has been reached.
    MaxScoreStopCondition.Config<T extends Comparable>  
    NoMoreStopCondition
    The simpliest stop condition that adds no more stops condition than the parameters manager one.
    NoMoreStopCondition.Config  
    StopCondition
    A class to add another (than the default ParametersManager.hasJobsToExplore()) stop conditions to the hyperparameter research execution.
    StopCondition.Config
